title: Collective Judgment Improvement Workshop for Sustainability Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific knowledge and sustainability concepts, experience in group decision-making
context.additional_context: Sustainability education competency enhancement program for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can make more accurate judgments in situations of group conformity pressure using the INFO technique.
Learners can analyze complex real-world problems from a sustainability perspective through interdisciplinary case studies.
Learners can improve collective errors in environmental planning and transportation system estimation tasks by over 20% using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
